Queries:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `TableColumn` (
`DbName`  varchar(15) NOT NULL ,
`TableName`  varchar(63) NOT NULL ,
`Field`  varchar(63) NOT NULL ,
`Type`  varchar(63) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`Null`  varchar(63) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`Key`  varchar(63) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`Default`  varchar(63) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`Extra`  varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`DisplayOrder`  int(6) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`DateTimeStamp`  timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,
PRIMARY KEY (`DbName`, `TableName`, `Field`),
INDEX `DbName` USING BTREE (`DbName`, `TableName`) 
)
ENGINE=MyISAM
CHECKSUM=0
ROW_FORMAT=Dynamic
DELAY_KEY_WRITE=0
;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `TableForeignKey` (
`TableForeignKeyId`  int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,
`DbName`  varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`TableName`  varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`FieldName`  varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`ReferencedDbName`  varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`ReferencedTableName`  varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`ReferencedFieldName`  varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL ,
`DateTimeStamp`  timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,
PRIMARY KEY (`TableForeignKeyId`),
INDEX `DbName` (`DbName`) USING BTREE ,
INDEX `TableName` (`TableName`) USING BTREE ,
INDEX `FieldName` (`FieldName`) USING BTREE ,
INDEX `ReferencedDbName` (`ReferencedDbName`) USING BTREE ,
INDEX `ReferencedFieldName` (`ReferencedFieldName`) USING BTREE ,
INDEX `ReferencedTableName` (`ReferencedTableName`) USING BTREE 
)
ENGINE=MyISAM
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci
AUTO_INCREMENT=70
CHECKSUM=0
ROW_FORMAT=Dynamic
DELAY_KEY_WRITE=0
